The [Rogue Scholar API](https://inveniordm.docs.cern.ch/reference/rest_api_index/) is provide by the InvenioRDM application and provides a RESTful API for the Rogue Scholar service.

The customized version of the API documentation for Rogue Scholar is in the works. The previous version of the API is still available at [https://api.rogue-scholar.org/docs](https://api.rogue-scholar.org/docs) with a SwaggerUI interface, but will be retired in 2025.
